Boss.explanation: Backstage streamlines and automates development tasks, enabling faster product releases.
Boss.metrics: Time-to-market for new features or products.

Boss.explanation: Backstage provides a customizable platform for experimentation and integration with new technologies.
Boss.metrics: Number of new products or technology integrations created by developers.

Boss.explanation: Backstage can help deliver high-quality software products and features to customers faster.
Boss.metrics: Customer satisfaction survey results or feedback on product releases.

Boss.explanation: Backstage can help optimize development processes and reduce overhead costs, leading to better returns on software investments.
Boss.metrics: Reduction in software development costs or improvement in profitability of software products.

Geek.explanation: Backstage provides a unified platform for managing development tasks, reducing administrative time and increasing productivity.
Geek.metrics: Cycle time, lead time, code review feedback time, and number of bugs or issues.

Geek.explanation: Backstage enables teams to collaborate and communicate more effectively, resulting in higher quality code and faster development cycles.
Geek.metrics: Number of pull requests merged per sprint, improvement in code review feedback time, and reduction in time spent on administrative tasks.

Geek.explanation: Backstage integrates with tools for automated testing, code review, and analysis, resulting in higher-quality code and fewer errors in production.
Geek.metrics: Code coverage, reduction in number of bugs or issues in production, and improvement in code review feedback.

Geek.explanation: Backstage provides a consistent and intuitive platform, reducing the time it takes for new developers to get up to speed.
Geek.metrics: Reduction in time to onboard new developers, improvement in ramp-up time for new projects or features, and feedback from new developers on ease of use.
